survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Recycling Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee satisfaction and engagement with company-sponsored recycling programs to identify areas for improvement and increase participation.

questions.question_text: How aware are you of your company's workplace recycling programs?
questions.client_notes: Use as a baseline to measure awareness levels. Consider adding a follow-up question for those who select 'Not aware at all'.

script.question_text: How aware are you of your company's workplace recycling programs?

questions.question_text: Which materials do you regularly recycle at work? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select to understand which recycling streams are most utilized. Consider randomizing options to avoid order bias.

script.question_text: Which materials do you regularly recycle at work? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How convenient do you find the recycling stations in your workplace?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected any recycling materials in Q2
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale would also work here if more granularity is desired.

script.question_text: How convenient do you find the recycling stations in your workplace?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected any recycling materials in Q2

questions.question_text: What factors prevent you from recycling more at work?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'None of the above' in Q2 or 'Not very convenient'/'Not convenient at all' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with text field to capture unlisted reasons. Consider making this question required for these respondents.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox with optional text input (multi-choice with open-ended option)

script.question_text: What factors prevent you from recycling more at work?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected 'None of the above' in Q2 or 'Not very convenient'/'Not convenient at all' in Q3

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve the workplace recycling program?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture qualitative feedback. Consider character limit of 500 for mobile-friendliness.

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have to improve the workplace recycling program?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to participate in a workplace competition or rewards program for recycling?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure potential engagement with gamification elements.

script.question_text: How likely are you to participate in a workplace competition or rewards program for recycling?
